name: CheckbookNYC
0:
”Alexa ask check book what is total budget in 2018”
”Alexa ask check book how many active subcontracts for fiscal year 2018”
”Alexa ask check book how many subcontracts cancelled in 2017”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check book
des: CheckbookNYC voice assistant provides quick answer to most common questions of CheckbookNYC.com website users. CheckbookNYC.com is a data centric website that aggregates financial data of New York City tax payer dollars. It provides data about city budget, revenue, spending, contracts and payroll.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
